entry.title: Sharing the Story of Jesus | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 11 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: Sharing the Story of Jesus | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 11 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 11 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Sharing the Story of Jesus” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Eph. 2:1–10, 1 John 4:7–11, Mark 5:1–20, Heb. 10:19–22, Gal. 2:20, 1 Cor. 1:30.
Memory Text: “These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life, and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of God” (1 John 5:13, NKJV).
(September 5 - September 11, 2020)
Sunday (Ryan Day) “Jesus: The Basis of Our Testimony” Monday (Jill Morikone) “The Transformative Power of Personal Testimony” Tuesday (Danny Shelton) “Telling the Story of Jesus” Wednesday (John Lomacang) “Testifying With Assurance” Thursday (Kenny Shelton) “Something Worth Testifying About”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ320_11.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

entry.title: Lessons Learned in God's Waiting Room | Sermon by Shelley Quinn

media:group.media:title: Lessons Learned in God's Waiting Room | Sermon by Shelley Quinn
media:group.media:description:
Church sermon produced by 3ABN with Shelley Quinn. Do you find yourself in emotional pain, physical pain, with anxiety ridden thoughts, or just going through mental anguish? In this episode Shelley shares her personal testimony on how the Lord has shown her His love and the many ways that God has helped her during uncounted hours of pain and suffering. Join 3ABN Shelley Quinn as she opens the Bible to teach from the word of God.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: An Exciting Way to Get Involved | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: An Exciting Way to Get Involved | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 10 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “An Exciting Way to Get Involved” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Gen. 1:1, 2, 26; Exod. 18:21–25;1 Cor. 12:12–25; Acts 16:11–15, 40; Acts 4:31; Acts 12:12
Memory Text: “Then He said to His disciples, ‘The harvest truly is plentiful, but the laborers are few. Therefore pray the Lord of the harvest to send out laborers into His harvest’ ” (Matthew 9:37, 38, NKJV).
(August 29 - September 4, 2020)
Sunday (Jill Morikone) “Small Groups: God’s Idea First” Monday (Kenny Shelton) “Small Groups in Scripture” Tuesday (Ryan Day) “Organized for Service” Wednesday (John Dinzey) “New Testament Small Groups” Thursday (John Lomacang) “Small Group Dynamics”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ320_10.pdf

media:group.media:title: 7 Dangers of Legalism vs Grace (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
Church sermon produced by 3ABN with Jill Morikone. There seems to be a lot of confusion in the area of grace and legalism. For example, are we saved by works? If not what role do works play in the life of a christian? Where is the balance of trusting and believing in Jesus and rejecting the message of the Bible to walk as Jesus walked? The Bible teaches that we can have assurance of salvation and free of guilt. Join 3ABN Vice President/COO Jill Morikone as she opens the Bible to teach us about grace and legalism.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
➡️SUBSCRIBE https://bit.ly/3ABN_Subscribe
💗DONATE https://bit.ly/3ABN_Donate
